attributes.action: To allow the use of Electric Skateboards, Hovertrax on roads and/or pavements.
attributes.additional_details: Several By-laws and Laws prevent the use of Mini powered electronic transportation devices which takes the Free-will of the person to do what he/she pleases, being Forced to used the public transport which costs considerably much more that items such as "Boosted Boards". As technology evolves, Considerations of changing or introducing new laws must be done.
attributes.background: As the human technology evolves, increasing mini-electronic devises such as "Boosted Boards" should be allowed to be used as a mode of transport having the "Free will" to do so without having to use Public transport to saving money and become a much more eco-friendly citizens.
